segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, someone with five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
segments.en: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: Someone with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: Someone with five qualities is raised up to heaven

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: Someone with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
